properties.name: elevation
properties.description: How raised the component should appear in relation to its surrounding.

properties.name: rounded
properties.description: If true, component will have rounded corners.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.type:
container
| surface
| float
| primary
| secondary
| tertiary
| default
| danger
| warning
| success
| info
| invert
| none
properties.description: Fill color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this role.

properties.name: gutterBottom
properties.description: If true, a margin space will be added below the component.
